country-year: id-to, year, destination-institution-type, creditor-type, creditor-institution, financing-type, value
Disbursements on long-term debt from official sources (excluding disbursements reported as ODA or OOFs)
Development Initiatives based on World Bank International Debt Statistics and OECD DAC

To avoid double counting disbursments on ODA loans and OOFs are removed from the reported disbursements of long-term debt from concessional/non-concessional sources from bilateral/multilateral providers.
